mapper.select: select * from ScglDC where (id=(select MAX(id) from ScglDC))
mapper.insert: insert into ScglDC( targetCapacity, actualCapacity, targetEfficiency, workingHours, beat) values(#{targetCapacity},#{actualCapacity},#{targetEfficiency},#{workingHours},#{beat})
mapper.update: update ScglDC set ( targetCapacity=#{ targetCapacity}, actualCapacity=#{actualCapacity}, targetEfficiency=#{targetEfficiency}, workingHours=#{ workingHours}, beat=#{beat}, date=#{date}) where date=#{date}
